{{cpp/experimental/title|simd_size}}
{{cpp/experimental/simd/navbar}}

{{ddcl|header=experimental/simd|since=parallelism_ts_2|1=
template&lt; class T, class Abi = simd_abi::compatible&lt;T&gt; &gt;
struct simd_size;
}}

If {{tt|T}} is a vectorizable type and {{c/core|is_abi_tag_v&lt;Abi&gt;}} is {{c|true}}, provides the member constant {{c|value}} equal to the width (number of elements) of {{c/core|simd&lt;T, Abi&gt;}}, irrespective of whether {{c/core|simd&lt;T, Abi&gt;}} is supported or not. For any other types {{tt|T}} and {{tt|Abi}}, there is no member {{c|value}}.

{{cpp/types/nospec|v}}

===Helper variable template===
{{ddcl|since=parallelism_ts_2|1=
template&lt; class T, class Abi = simd_abi::compatible&lt;T&gt; &gt;
constexpr std::size_t simd_size_v = simd_size&lt;T, Abi&gt;::value;
}}

{{cpp/types/integral_constant/inherit2|the width of {{tt|simd&lt;T, Abi&gt;}}|std::size_t}}
